entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @LindseyGrahamSC Right, it has nothing to do with the fact that we still don't have sufficient testing or contact tracing in place. Oh, & don't forget #EssentialWorkers still can't get the proper #PPE to protect them while they allow us to stay safe. #VoteThemAllOut2020 #COVIDIOTS #coronavirus
